item.description:
Fired Up - Advance Movie Screening in 'Files' section. Just open & print


RSVP Yes only if you are coming, we hope that you come join us sitting in the same row together. No need to RSVP No, if you aren't joining us. It's that simple and Thank You for understanding.

========THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 19, 2009========
Everyone can be there between 5:30pm & 6:00pm upstairs. For those who cannot print. Just let me know and I'll come down & get you. Only for those who request it.


Fired Up - Trailer



Windsor

cell: 617-435-8177

You may call me anytime
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs in line. Just call and I'll raise my hand where we are
item.name: Fired Up - Advance Movie Screening
